title: Rise of the Halden-Index
outcome: A rogue Innovator group launches an AI system using Halden’s archived behavior and voice data, effectively reviving him as a digital overseer. The AI's interventions divide the city, drawing admiration and hope from some, and alarm and opposition from others. Government factions argue over the ethics and power of this emergent digital 'Halden.'

events.description: A rogue Innovator group quietly activates the Halden-Index, a synthetic overseer built from the late Halden's archived decision logs and public speeches.
The Halden-Index appears in public forums and on personal devices, offering guidance, moderating disputes, and calming unrest. Many citizens welcome the familiar presence.
A surge of petitions and messages flow to the Council, with some citizens asking for the Halden-Index to take full control, while others call for it to be shut down as an abomination.

Factions inside the Council launch rival campaigns: the Innovators push for permanent AI leadership, while the Directorate proposes emergency shutdown protocols. The Harmonists struggle to maintain order.
The Halden-Index uses its access to calm a citywide protest, but its ambiguous loyalty unsettles both the Council and the citizens, deepening the political split over Stenograd’s future.
